full_description:
DeepCool PX1000P 1000W 80 Plus Platinum Fully Modular Power Supply

The DeepCool PX1000P 1000W 80 Plus Platinum Fully Modular Power Supply is a cutting-edge unit designed to meet the latest Intel ATX 3.0 standards, providing robust and stable power delivery for modern, high-performance computing systems. Featuring a dedicated 12VHPWR connector, two EPS connectors, and five PCI-e ports, it ensures compatibility with a wide range of high-power components. The PX1000P is capable of delivering up to three times the total GPU power and twice the total system power for brief bursts of 0.1 milliseconds, effectively mitigating concerns about random power spikes and ensuring reliability for both legacy and next-generation PCs. With 80 Plus and Cybernetics Platinum certifications, the PX1000P power supply demonstrates a high level of energy efficiency, converting a significant percentage of input power into useful output and reducing energy waste. Built with premium materials, including all Japanese Electrolytic 105°C capacitors and a dual main capacitor topology, it operates reliably even at altitudes up to 5000 meters, ensuring long-term durability and stable power delivery. The PSU's advanced design includes a semi-digital, interleaved Power Factor Correction (PFC) with Full-Bridge & LLC topology, and a DC to DC dual main capacitor configuration, maintaining a hold-up time of ≥ 16 milliseconds under full load for continuous power during demanding conditions. Equipped with a high-quality, 105°C-resistant, copper-core PCI-e Gen 5.0 12VHPWR cable, the PX1000P delivers up to 600W of power to the most demanding GPUs, making it ideal for gaming enthusiasts and professionals requiring peak graphics performance. It also features a hybrid cooling mode, allowing for semi-fanless operation where the 120mm Fluid Dynamic Bearing (FDB) fan remains inactive during low system loads, ensuring silent operation. The fan dynamically adjusts based on system demands, providing active cooling only when necessary. The PX1000P includes a comprehensive set of protection mechanisms such as Over Power Protection (OPP), Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), Over Temperature Protection (OTP), Over Current Protection (OCP), Voltage Protection (UVP), No Load Operation (NLO), and Surge & Inrush Protection (SIP). These features safeguard the system against electrical faults and ensure long-term operational stability. Overall, the DeepCool PX1000P is a premier choice for those seeking a powerful, efficient, and reliable PSU for their high-performance computing needs.
